Name: Computational Model
Configuration Settings.Description: Stores the computational model. It should the evaluation of the model at the given reference data points.

Name: Reference Data
Configuration Settings.Description: Reference data required to calculate likelihood. Model evaluations are compared against these data.

Name: Likelihood Model

Options.Description: Uses an additive normal process to produce the likelihood.
Uses a multipicative normal process to produce the likelihood.
Uses an multiplicative normal process (data) to produce the likelihood.

Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the likelihood model to approximate the reference data to.
